column1: Health Economics and Decision Science MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe UCL MSc in Health Economics and Decision Science spans the disciplines of Economics, Epidemiology, and Statistics, providing students with outstanding theoretical foundations and the ability to solve applied real-world problems. This degree offers a unique multidisciplinary environment for people aiming at tackling global health challenges using advanced quantitative techniques.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
